scenario_text.value: The throne room is just ahea—Whaaa’?!
So this way’s blocked off, too...
Is there any other way, Miu?

Nooo... This is the only entrance to the
throne room. Now what?!

Shit! We’ve got no choice but to break this
damn barricade ourselves!
A wall that big?! You’ve gotta be kidding!

(This is bad... We don’t know if we can find
Jijimon, and enemies could attack any time.)

Jijimooon! You’re there, aren’t you?!
It’s me! Open uuup!

Oh-ho? A little hole opened up under the wall
there.
Well now, is that Miu’s voice I hear?
Jijimon?! You’re safe! What a relief!

But of course! Come, squeeze in through this
here crack.
